title: Game is rigged to steal money
text: This game is addicting, but not worth spending money on it. I have played long enough to where I have spent money on one of their luring deals, but trust me when I say to stay away. Not only bc it's not worth the money but bc it seems like there is a convenient glitch after I made my purchase. (Game froze long enough to lose game)This seems to be the same case with other individuals too. I emailed them and they said they would look into it and return my money. They never replied back or returned my money. Enjoy the free coins they give you and never become so competitive that you buy coins out of despair. It's what they rely on to make their money. I made that mistake only once. The game is obviously rigged. They use bots that obviously cannot lose. Line up straight with the pocket and it misses. They do not match individuals up within their ranking.

title: Glitches Galore, Rip Off
text: Don’t get me wrong, the game is really fun. I love the sound design and the controls are usually very smooth. The issue lies in the fact that it’s blatantly obvious the creators have no concern for actual competitiveness. They’re more concerned with trying to drain you of every last dollar they can, while simultaneously providing a service not worthy of a dime. As I continue playing, I increasingly realize how little the game cares about you and your effort. There’s a horrific timer glitch that ends your turn sometimes before the timer is even half complete. There’s also a rampant connection glitch that has made an appearance in at least 98% of the matches I’ve played, and it works very well with the timer glitch to ruin games. In the last game I played, I made one of the best final 8-ball shots I had ever done. I felt really accomplished and proud! I even did it with more than half my timer left. The game, however, decided to completely reverse my shot and give the cue ball back to my opponent. How does that even work? Fun game, but absolutely attrocious how they treat their players. Don’t give them a dime.

title: NEVER WIN THIS GAME
text: You can play against others that are your skill level or slightly close if you bet the 50;100,200 coin games but as soon as you move up and wanna bet higher then the “wheel of competitors” lands conveniently against someone clearly out of your skill level.  On top of that, the higher skilled person breaks sinking at least a ball or two and then runs the table.  If you break, rarely does a ball fall or if one does then so does the cue ball which conveniently gives opponent ball in hand..then guess what happens?  Of course they run the table or fail 1 ball short only to allow you a half assed shot possible.  Now, when the opponent is always breaking and then running the table time after time after time and MILLIONS of coins later it becomes VERY CLEAR AS WELL. That this is A VERY RIGGED GAME NOT INTENDED FOR ANYONE TO HAVE OR BELIEVE THEY HAVE ANY CHANCE OF MAINTAINING WHATEVER MONIES THAT THEY MIGHT HAVE PURCHASED WHATSOEVER.....

title: Fun but Frustrating
text:
This game is a lot of fun, but that is because I love the game of pool and it really stops there. 

Your algorithms for this game are completely unfair and DESTROY the integrity of your game. And here’s the problem, you do a TERRIBLE job at hiding it. Here are a few examples. 

1. Wheel Spin is a complete joke! Either make it fair or lose it from the game. Stop wasting people’s time (also takes forever). I stopped playing it for good when I had over 120 spins to use and out of the 120 I got over 500 maybe once or twice. 

2. I have no idea what your problem is with keeping this game fair but for the love of everything fix your algorithm for who breaks! I’m so sick of playing well and I won’t break for 4 or 5 games in a row followed up with my opponents break and run. When you’re playing in tournaments or for big coins it completely stops me from playing the game!

3. I have played against several bots on this game and it is painfully obvious. Playing on tables you must call all shots, and they make every shot, every time, in the pocket they called. But here is the kicker (pun intended), is they could call a pocket with a straight in shot and shoot it at a weird angle, it hits 3-5 different balls and 2 or 3 rails and drains it every time. Now some may chalk that up as luck. But not when its EVERY SHOT OF THE GAME!!! 

Fix your game! It’s not right and you know it. You manipulate the game to where everyone who plays it stays hooked just enough to come back.

title: Fix the waits for opponent!
text:
There’s a lot of greatness here—the physics are second to none, and the gameplay is superb (although the fact that when you wager anything over 5000, your opponent wins without you even getting a single shot over 80% of the time is very suspect), and more. But there is one big issue here—it allows people with slow/intermittent internet connections to play, and makes you WAIT for their system to respond before you can play. It doesn’t count the lost time against them, it doesn’t notify you that they’ve reconnected and it’s now your turn (with the clock running against you), nothing. Eventually, it will time out someone whose system delay is too long—but that amount of time is WAY too long. Especially in a tournament, where one player’s delays slows down the whole tourney for ALL participants. 

Fix this, and I can see bumping this up to five stars.  But until then, I just can’t do it.

title: Pool ball
text: One day I went on App Store and saw this game and got it and glad to get it. I am thankful and blessed that I got this game. I got my iPad for Christmas and thankful I got the iPad to play this game. I win a lot of people but the point is to have fun not win a bunch of people. I am happy to win but I would rather have this game than just have other games. I would pay if I had to buy this game. I would use my iTunes gift card if I needed to! There is a few things I don’t really like or get but a fun game I am happy to get this game. Who ever thought of this game good thinking. I like it. MAN I cannot say how much I like this game! Thank you for making and thinking of this game I think it is one of the best games it is one of my favorites that why I did the five stars I would recommend it to everyone I Could. I would tell my family about it even my cousins. Thanks again good thinking!!!

title: Great game but don’t spend money on it
text: Game is fun for a while then it starts to cheat. Whoever decided that it’s a good marketing ploy to make the free spins super obliviously rigged should be fired TODAY ! Your only planting the seed that your game is dishonest. Why? what’s the advantage of doing this? Society across the world has the WalMart syndrome, give me what I paid for or I’ll return it. Your not going to win by scamming the customers. Im also amazed at the concept that the shot clock speeds up as you progress threw the game. This tells me, the customer, that you the programmer will screw its customers in the most obvious of ways and not care. Why the hell would a normal person kick out hard earned money knowing the programmers do these type of things. Please offer a game that is TOTALLY random and I will gladly pay a fee to join knowing it’s my fault if I loose. Not some ignorant marketing genius out to scam its customers . Makes no sense . Hire a WalMart executive to run your company and see how much money you can really make. Honestly.

title: Loved the game until hackers have taken over!
text: Great game is almost dead! I’m not sure what is going on with this issue with the cheto hackers that have taken over Venice, Berlin, Mumbai, Miami and every other big table. I wish you would fix this! The hackers are ruining the game and you guys are allowing hackers to take over stealing our hard earned and purchased coins! We report them by in game option and send reports to you against them but weeks go by with no action against them! Who’s team are you on? Hackers or honest players like myself who have spent a lot of real money on the game! I will no longer support your bank account I’m done spending money with you and I know many others that are done as well… Pretty sad considering I have been playing over 10 years now, it use to be great with no problems whatsoever. I suggest anyone who is starting to play this game to wait until they fix the issues rather than being taken advantage of losing all you have worked for!

title: Help me
text:
Been playing this for years off and on and I do love it.  I realize it’s a bit of a money trap and rigged to some degree but still very fun. 
My issues:  1: when a friend challenges me, I accept, but the game never starts and the avatar box just keeps spinning like it’s trying to find a player.  I have not been able to play with any friend through challenges.  2: I have an iPhone 12 blah blah, when I’m playing with sound on, if I get a call that I reject, a notification from another app, or my alarm goes off, I lose all game sounds until I restart the app.
3: I only receive challenges while already in a game, very annoying, and I cannot play that other person anyway.  4:  physics are off more than usual, I’ve had at least 10 out of 20 games change the balls around after they stopped rolling on a break.  Other than these complaints, the game is addicting.

title: Cheating
text: There is extreme cheating going on within the game community here . That is being done most often by nameless guests. Some named players have also taken up this tactic, in the last half hour alone I have been cheated out of over 3 and a half million pool chips. I have played pool all over the world and in many establishments. Never have I seen rules set for pool play such as this, and the cue action of these players mentioned are impossible and defy the law of physics . Simply said the shot can’t be made however they make it. It is a shame because I like this game. In total cheating has cost me more than 10 million in pool chip. I do it the honest way and earn my rewards on the tables, I don’t purchase anything. You should police your game . Also the bots being used within this game is a shame. It impossible to beat your opponent in two shots, with one being the break. Administrators you should be very ashamed of yourselves for allowing this in your game. This probably will not be posted due to all of the truths I have pointed out to the online community.

title: Um. This game has messed up everything
text:
Miniclip. First of all. FIX YOUR GAME!!! 
Literally I lost all my progress cause it connected to the WRONG FACEBOOK. I was a level 31!! 31!!!! I had Facebook friends. I had a lot of cues. I have been a loyal player and I get on a lot. This is ridiculous! I can't even challenge friends now!!! It says "update the game". NO!!! IT'S ALREADY FULLY UPDATED!!! WHAT'S GOING ON HERE!!! This is my last way of getting to the company of Miniclip. I asked for help. Did I get any? No! I did not! I should still be a level 31. Not a level 10. I can't even challenge my girlfriend cause it says I need to update the app! I started a new game on my tablet. I connected it to Facebook. I lost all my progress. And a few Facebook friends that I can't even challenge now. What's going on here Miniclip! I expect to be contacted or me and everyone that I know that has Miniclip games, we will all boycott these games. 8 Ball Pool has been amazing for the last year. All the time I spent on this game. And now I get screwed over out of my original profile. Help me fix this plz or there will be a drop in the people owning these games.

title: Great game!
text:
Very realistic play! Not perfect but quite close, great physics algorithm, I wish you could type in your own chat. My cash and coins keep disappearing though, I don't spend real money on it so no big deal, I just like the game, annoying though, I've started a couple tickets in complaint, got a response they say they're looking into it so just waiting to hear back, oh well fun game anyway... 

REVIEW UPDATE

They respond but act like they’ve never heard of this before and they want you to take screen shots of your coins disappearing, I just had 7 coins disappear from my account, no big deal because I don’t spend any money on the game, just a warning to all who want to spend there hard earned money on coins or cash in this game because they will disappear and miniclip will fain complete ignorance, while they flakily take your money. You’ve been warned, play it but don’t pay it!

Review update

It's gotten better, there working out the cash disappearing bugs, the best pool game by far, I've still never paid for anything, I may start because it's so well designed, you don't need to pay for anything to progress, that's one of the things that makes this game great, but I kinda feel guilty now so I think I will buy a few things to support this games awesomeness. Thank you programmers ☺️

title: The game
text: Been playing thus game a few years ..really fun game but I have  to agree with others ... on the free spins usually I get very low payout on the spin .. never get anything big .. bout 80-85% of the time , seems like  a lot of people are using cheat sites to win games here , how is this even possible to use on ur site .. today for example .. I played 6-8 games .. won 2  .. lost the rest to a one shot combo into the 9 ball .. some I could see was no way it could make it..the games seem rigged  to me ... or the cheat sites they use ... another example .. I have scratched on all most every shot in a game ... cmon really !! I shoot in real life and here when I’m at work ... u want me to spend money to better equipment ? Let’s see u spend it to upgrade better , get the cheat programs off ur site ... .. Finally , enough sticks already ...and furthermore, if the game doesn’t want u to win ! U won’t

title: Love this game buttttt
text: I have been playing with ALOT OF HACKERS. MAKING IMPOSSIBLE SHOTS NOT EVEN THE BEST PLAYER CAN MAKE. YOU CANT TELL ME A TRICK SHOT ETC NOT AIM AT THE POCKET OR THE POCKET INTENDED IF SO AND THEY MAKE IT 😡. I report regularly! PLEASE SOMEONE TELL ME HOW THIS WORKS… I play HARD, FAIR AND POLITE!  I enjoy the league that I am in.. my leader and co-leaders , besides myself are the ones who GOT ME TO WHERE I AM IN THIS LEAGUE IF IT WASNT FOR THEM!! I will not quit but I will not quit leaving reviews either BECAUSE this is the best pool game out there .. SO TELL ME WHAT HAPPENS TO THESE PEOPLE! title: Rigged (funny how this name was taken. Shows I’m not the only one)
text:
It’s glaringly obvious once you reach the 20s level, you can’t win. Even with clear shots, the physics rejects my shots. You also end up playing players (likely bots. All foreign. I haven’t played an American in months) that just hit the ball willy nilly but magically something goes in for them. One time he just aimed aimlessly and 3 balls went in for him. And why is it I literally always play someone higher rated than me? That’s interesting because somehow that means they play someone ranked lower (me). Hmm. Magically overnight I go from winning many games in a row to consistently losing now, while using same tactics. I’d rather lose knowing my opponent was skilled which is not the case here. My opponents now are foreigners who just aimlessly strike the ball but somehow always a ball goes in. The AI is glaring. 

The objective obviously leads to one being frustrated and spend money for a cue with highest guidelines or need more coins. Do not ever pay money for this game. That can’t be stressed enough. 

It’s funny how they ask for a nickname. Rigged, BS, good bye were all taken.

title: Fun game, but glitches
text: I play this game ALL the time. The only complaint I have is with a few glitches.. it seems like the rules that they give apply sometimes but not other times, even on the same level. For example, if I accidentally don't hit a ball hard enough and it doesn't hit the wall, the other person gets ball in hand. If the other person does the same thing in the same game, I don't get ball in hand. Super weird. Also, I just played a game where I had a hard time getting my shot on my ball, but I did get it there. I ended up making two of my balls, but the other player got ball in hand because it said I didn't hit my own ball, which I did. Also, sometimes the stick is very hard to balance and it wants to go in all sorts of direction. PLEASE fix these glitches because it's very frustrating and causes me to lose games. All in all, I do enjoy this game and will continue to play.

title: Omg it’s been over a decade 🌹
text: Well this APP has surely watched me grow up, and vise versa tbh! I’ve been played this specific game since high school, and now coming up to my 30th birthday, I am absolutely amazed to admit that I still play.. OFTEN!  I have also moved myself into IRL tournaments like APA and BCA over the years, trying my luck among some of the greatest world wide. Billiards will always maintain being my favorite “table top”game, a prime example of both mathematics and ingenuity! Ps, I wouldn’t recommend looking for love here, being catfished through a game issa new time low that although I fell for, I wouldn’t want others to also succumb to.. it was definitely something my friends laughed at me about… anyways, from the female gamer’s perspective, I appreciate the development over the years and hope to continue watching the games unfold!

title: Great game a must have
text: If you like pool then you’ll love this game. The other reviews complain about luck/skill or crashing. Well the games that don’t cost much to get into, those are the ones ppl don’t care if they lose or not. They’ll knock the mess out of it and sink it in a pocket they wasn’t shooting for. Kinda aggravating but that’s pool on cheap tables. Play the tables you have to call all pockets and that eliminate that. They are high dollar but you play with other skilled players. The connection issue, me personally never had a problem but I only play in WiFi so I say it’s service provider and signal issue for them. Try it out you’ll be hooked cause it’s highly addictive. I get burned out on occasion, can’t win a game for nothing seems like. I put the game down come back couple days later and back to winning again. This game I awwwwwsummmm great job miniclip.

title: 8 ball pool
text: I’ve had this game for a couple months. And I enjoy it. I gave it 4 stars because of minor things other than that this game would be a 5 I mean you can’t go wrong with a billiard (pool)game. The reason I gave it a 4 is because of the annoying advertisements. What I mean by that is when I open the game and enter the main lobby I get a notification saying some of my friends was online and do I want to challenge. You can’t ignore it because it’ll just stay there. Like first of all why would I want to play someone that was RRRRECENTLY ONLINE??? Then when I don’t accept it another one pops up to see if I want to challenge someone else that was recently online. I deny that one enter a game and another one pops up like cmon man if I want to challenge someone I’ll just go to the section to challenge them. Puhlease take that annoying thing off the game because it’s so annoying I’m thinking about deleting the game

title: I like the game just a few draw backs
text:
I love the game just a few things that make me mad when I play.

1. Sometimes when I shoot with low time left, it will show my shot, then when all balls stop, and the game will freeze. Then it will a the opponents turn and the balls will reset to before I shot.
Sometimes it takes a bit to lineup the shot, and I use a que with extra time for that reason,(extra time) and to be jipped out of a potential win cuz of that detours me from the game.

2. You need to make it to where after 2 turns of not shooting(no movement) the other player should auto win.
I had a game where the 8ball and one of each of our balls were touching it, and there wasn’t a clean shot for either of us. So the person to shoot and break up the balls would lose. It was my opponent turn and he just sat there and did nothing, so I did the same, and it went back in forth like that for 5 rounds, before I gave up and just took a shot.
Of course I lost cuz I didn’t make my shot and he won, when I was the one who set up the balls like that to keep my opponent from make it the shot.
Like in real life you don’t get a timer, so taking shots to block the opponent is strategy, and this game diminishes any form of strategy cuz the opponent can just skip his turn and make you take the hard shot. It’s jus unfair and makes me not want to play the game.

title: Review
text: I’m a pool enthusiast myself and I find this game the best mobile pool game ever! However there are a few things that would make this game perfect. If they could add jump shots and masse shots, allowing the player to realistically maneuver around the balls as desired. Although in real pool some shots require you to hit on top of the ball making it real difficult to the player and the cue ball will act different. Such as when you are against the railing you would have only a limited space where you can hit the cue ball. For example when you aim towards another rail it would be impossible to put low English. But not impossible to perform a masse shot(hitting the cue ball on top or Ariel view)and Also when the win streak challenges are up, it used to be the final reward was for 250k coins. Now it’s barley 70k along with the other rewards being really low.

title: Loved it for years until I needed support...
text:
All that play understand the quality of the experience. However, it seems as if the developers have decided to retire and continue to collect on in-app purchases. Imagine enjoying an awesome game for years... Then all of a sudden, your points don't show up in the leader board or weekly competitions that earn you in-app cash. You would assume reporting this bug would solve it, but unfortunately this is an issue other users run into. Either way, you report this within Miniclip, and it's crickets for weeks. (Still haven't heard anything). Honestly, service and support is what earns my business.

Oh yeah, and btw, I land on a measly $100 every day I spin. Oddly enough, the chances of me landing on the same plot of the wheel day in and day out makes the powerball look like a 50/50 raffle.

**Update: It looks like the issue resolved itself. I'm adding a star for this, but still not been contacted as the automated response said I would.

title: DO NOT BUY
text:
YALL KEEP REMOVING MY REVIEW! Screw this I’m filing a complaint. I have never seen such wicked business practices

Fact is this ALL of these “positive reviews” are paid and autogenerate.  Mini clip has a army of of fake accounts that will log on and say the most random meaningless reviews and give it 5 stars! Next what happens is someone will specifically make a review directly aim at a previous negative review. ITS SO OBVIOUS WHAT THIS GAME IS!  they lie on the review, 4.7?  They lie and cheat in game by controlling the spins of the cue ball, ridiculous tampering of physics and playing again bots in game.  I look forward to a class action lawsuit against this company.  Apple has no shame in supporting this app in their store!

People have thousands of videos and photos of all of 8 ball pools janky practices! Anyone who gives this a 5 star is a moderator or paid off to do so, no way humans are that dense to give a game that blatantly cheats a 5 star review.  PEOPLE HAVE THE POWER TO STOP GAMES LIKE THIS. DONT SPEND ON ANYTHING, DO NOT DOWNLOAD and file complaints against the gaming company!  This app needs to be SHUT DOWN PERMANENTLY

title: Fair play reports
text: I love this game, I used to play back on the computer in middle school, now that it’s mobile and in my pocket it’s so cool. I have really gotten back into the game and even the new things that exist in the app. The ONLY issue is that there is no way (at least that I have found) to report a player for suspicious or unfair play. Several times I have been matched against individuals that exploit the game mechanics to their benefits and I feel somewhat taken advance of. There need to be some form of report play or other patches in some game mechanics. Ex) no shot clock in 9 ball, players will wait out their turn till the last moment and take the last and winning shot if you happen to miss by then. Again it’s not cheating atm but it seems incredible unsportsmanlike and cheap. Put a shot clock on, or kick an inactive player if they skip more than three shot turns.

title: Absolute Scam
text: This entire app is literally just a scam! You will not play a real person one time even though they lead you to believe that you are. The matchups are rigged beyond belief and even if you earn a win, the game will force you to lose. Either they will actually take your shot back and say it’s actually your opponents turn or just make you miss shots even if you aim perfectly. If you’re about to win the game and the only ball you have left to pot is the 8 ball, you may drain the shot but then the game will make you scratch meaning you lose anyway. One way or another the game will make you lose lots of games even if you earned a win. Absolutely loaded with bots and half the games you play will result in a win because your opponent left which you will only realize after waiting 45 minutes for them to “respond.” I don’t know what the living crap apple is doing giving this editors choice because in reality it is one of the most pathetic games I’ve ever witnessed. I would pay for this game to be taken off the App Store!

title: Issues
text: This is a great game and a great way to pass time. I only gave 3 stars as there a few things wrong with it. First is I’m currently at level 31 and most of my opponents that the game chooses for me are 60 or more. So most of the time I don’t even get a turn. I don’t mind losing but when you lose 16 or more games in row or more cause the game chooses better opponents gets old and frustrating. The other thing is when you click on a game to enter it should ask if you are or sure or not. I had over 1 million coins and dropped my phone and tried to catch it and clicked on a game whilst trying to catching it and entered a match I didn’t want to. This is one of the times my opponent was over 100 and I lost. Everything. Brought me down to a little over 40k. And lastly the daily spin. I always hit 250 or less. Every. Single. Time. Why have the other options on there if you don’t let anybody hit it? Fix these issues and I’ll definitely give you 5 stars. It is a great game!

title: Highly addictive
text: Been playing this game for well over a year. It’s only the rare venue that you can pocket a ball without calling your shot. It’s funny that Miniclip advertises this game as having realistic physics or whatever they say. Cause that’s what has always amazed me about this game. The physics are perfect and I can’t even imagine how that’s done. All I know is that the game is perfect. And if you don’t want to spend any money, you don’t have to and can still have fun playing the game for as long as you want. However if you want to try and gather some “super pool sticks”, you can spend a little money every once in awhile. The only thing I don’t like about the game is that I dont understand how they pick who gets to break. Oftentimes I’ll find that my opponent breaks for up to 5 times in a row. But I never get to break more than a couple times in a row.

title: Terrible matchmaking
text:
From level 1 to level 15 , they will always give you opponents who’s levels are significantly higher then yours (which means much better cues, almost minimum chances of winning against them etc.) . I guess it’s their way of saying thank you to people who pay to play , by matchmaking them with lower levels so they can win more easily. i just played 5 games in a row against three 100+ levels, one against 71 level and one against 60+ level. I am level 15. It’s impossible to win if you make a single mistake, because their cues are way better. Also those players play in the same tournaments where the stakes are low, just so they can get rings and wins. GAME MUST LIMIT THIS. They should make them play against similar levels. It is not fair at all. If they want to play with lower stakes, make them play each other. Not us. I wouldn’t mind if I was level 72 to play against 100+ level BUT I’M JUST LEVEL 15
Matchmaking is absolutely terrible, TERRIBLE!!

title: Give us option to Hide SMILEYS.
text:
First of all big ups to the developers of this great realistic game, Always a good time playing and when I loose it really gets to me, that’s just how realistic this game is.
I ALWAYS participate in the “Pool Pass” season and I never miss to purchase all the smileys and comments that comes with it (my favorite). 
But now I have a long list of smiley that when I want to use one to express myself in a game, I have to scroll all the way and sometimes I even have to find with my eyes.
It will be easier if I could just hide the unnecessary smilies that I don’t get to use often and keep the once I do use often, just like how you can hide and move your comments to the top or bottom, yes there’s an option for that but not for smiley. Please make it possible and give us an update.

title: Miniclip 8 ball pool
text: I like this game as does millions of other people from all over the world , i gave miniclip a 3 star rating , i have been playing about 4 years now.  , The pet peive of millions of players is that there are cheats in this game using line tools and computerized ball line charts going on for 2’plus years now . these people steal your game coins and with the staff of m/clip has had continuous complaints and their HAS NOT been any relief in sight. Mini clip continues to put out more commercial ads to buy their vitual products, but has done nothing thus far to eradicate the problem.  There used to be great team tournaments and sparring between clubs and comaraderi , not any more though it’s fading away in a big hurry. Used to be real enjoyable to play but now a person can look forward to meeting up with a  cheat on any given table and lose your hard worked for coins, ….disguting and very frustrating to say the least.

title: Cheat codes
text: I really like this game. It’s really fun and I love that you play real people meaning that the game is totally fair because it’s my skill against yours only I’m Reading this one star because of all the freaking cheaters they’re on this game. Every third or fourth game somebody just pulls back full power and smashes the ball and does three or four banks in the ball goes in no matter what. Popped up a few months ago and I’m seeing people on the Internet that say the same thing so I know it’s not just me. I don’t mind losing to somebody who’s better than me but working hard to win a game just to have my coin stolen from a cheater every three or four games I’m done with it. Also I get in spurts where no matter what I do if I hit a ball full power I scratch. I believe this is because I have not spent money on this game because I’ll go 15 maybe 20 games without scratching and then I’ll scratch 10 or 15 games in a row I don’t believe that’s a coincidence maybe it is but no excuse for Cheat Codes being able to continue on this game ruins it for fair players

title: Good and bad
text: I like the game but it has its bugs that need to be fixed. One is cue ball control very hard to put draw on the cue ball. Matter of fact sometimes it hard to line up a shot the controls are all over the place no matter what Sensitivity level you have it on. Next is the time limits the player Shooting as some many seconds between shots but the person not shooting as to be at the table between shots to Recognize the shot and you can not shot again until they are there. This has taken close to a minute at times and not time comes off them for doing this. So if you’re better then them they can keep leaving the table to aggravate you and not get penalized for it. It took me around 45 minutes to play a three round tournament that at most should have taken at most 25 minutes a few times.

title: I demand a refund
text:
Sure the game is good but there’s 2 huge problems. So I spent 3 months and I had 508,675 coins. Today when I went to close out the game, I accidentally pressed on a game that bets 500,000 coins. So I quickly exited and clicked out before they could pair me with someone. But when I came back a few hours later, I lost 500,000 coins. Turns out even if you close out before they pair you, you still get placed into a game. Why do you guys do that? Another huge problem is, even though I have enough coins to play in bigger levels, I like to play in Tokyo, which only bets 2,500 coins. And since I HAD around 5k coins, they would always bring me back to the 500,000 levels when I click on the “play online”. Which means I have to scroll all the way back to the Tokyo level, and I can accidentally press on a level I don’t want. That’s a quick way to lose my coins isn’t it :) 

Please give me my coins back and fix this problem. I do not want to work for another 3 months just to lose my coins again.

title: The typical game.
text: I know that people disagree about how games make sure that if you are a normal player you can’t win anything. But I found out that they were wrong. There are events like the pool pass or that one event going on right now where you can win big in-game prizes. But you can only do it if you are good at it. For the pool pass, more challenging pool games give you a certain amount but they don’t even give you a lot. Plus the event costs money to play which is really hard to get. But if you lose, and you don’t have enough money then you basically just lost unless you get more money. I feel like new players should get a chance to win something. Sadly, barely any games do that so I may just delete this game. This is also a pre teen right this review so I’m guessing other pre teens won’t like this game. I hope they improve but until they do this game is getting 2 stars. The 1 star is for being based off a real thing which is cool and being able to play with my dad which is fun for the second.

title: Good game
text: No I know I’m just game for a long time I been playing for like two years for the main brother and my dad showed me this game so I just started playing it then I got so good but you know would you play it’s fun scary thing is when you play on like someone that is on 484 or something then that’s the scary thing but if you’re that lower than you are very good I seen someone close to 10,000 or 1000 but the highest one I saw was about like 600 or 500 or 400 but good luck to your Alma level 17 if you see someone else on the team and I can I believe I have a cat face and I have a crown thank y’all for playing this game support Miniclip because she was the editor of this game thank you and follow mini clip on Instagram Snapchat TikTok and Facebook and Twitter everything that he has thank you for making this game

title: Used to be better
text: I used to look forward to the win streak tournaments as an exciting opportunity to get big payoffs after each game while winning our way to the jackpot at the end, but now all we get is tokens or something, that we have to use to buy stuff I dont want. It was a fun way to get big money for big entering big money games. Now, if you use your tokens as you go, you get little prizes, but if you save them till the tourney ends, you might miss shopping in their store and end up with nothing, or you can buy a cue that needs to be recharged for high chips, or needs to be upgraded, for chips. Or tickets to a tourney. There are opportunities to get more chips every day, but it isn’t exciting like winning a big pot. Sort of like when wheel of fortune went from buying stuff to getting money, it became much more exciting, but in reverse. Give us back our big winnings throughout the tourney for instant gratification instead of delayed and disappointing.

title: All the sore losers
text: My biggest problem is the amount of people who quit the game when your running the table or about to pocket the 8 ball. I get that some people leave games if they get a request or there phone battery dies but that not what’s always happening. I’ve had level 152 (high levels) leave before I can break cause there are only interested in breaking themselves. The amount of people leave when your winning is unreal at this point. So I’m sitting there waiting for the opponents response and they already quit and are playing a new game and I have to wait a few minutes. When they leave before you break cause they want to break you have to go another turn or two turns before you break again.  I think they should penalize you for every third game you quit. I get that I win the money and wins but it’s not the point.

title: Way too many cheaters
text: This is one of the best games ever made, but you will get sooooooooooooooooooooooooo sick of working hard to earn money to play bigger denomination games, just to have it taken away by cheaters when you get to play them! There is a cheat for this game that allows the player to make a ball in the pocket called no matter the circumstances. It might bounce off of 5 rails and 5 other balls, but it will go in the pocket called. It would be so easy for miniclip to do a scan of the files when you log on to make sure you are not using a cheat, but they could care less about that, they are just another money hungry company that could care less about the players. I’d i could give it zero stars i would! Because i am so sick of the cheaters that they allow to keep playing

title: Great…but! Would be nice to use as a learning tool, but!
text: This game is awesome, played it for years on other iPad and Mac mini, but I have two complaints/suggestions. This game is totally realistic, in every way (game play, graphics, sounds), but after making a mistake or losing a game, there’s a burning desire to ‘learn’ from ones mistakes. It would be so easy to record the most recent game being played (on one’s device), so a player could spend a couple minutes ‘studying and learning’ exactly what was done wrong and improve! Second suggestion that would improve this game ~ in current version it is totally fun when playing a tournament, winning a level, and waiting for next challenger to see the ‘text’ updates as to what’s going on with the other games. It would be so much MORE FUN to be able to see in mini display the other games being played. Keep up the good work, but make it even better!

title: Fun, but frustrating
text:
I like this game, but it’s also the first game that I’ve ever played that has made me want to snap my phone in half and throw it across the room. It’s completely unforgiving of any mistake you may make, from accidentally calling the wrong pocket, to accidentally releasing your cue. And one mistake can often cost you the entire game. 

The real crux of this game is that it’s designed to squeeze as much money out of you as possible. The notifications come far too often. The ads to buy in game currency are obnoxious. When you look for a match, it tries to seat you at the most expensive table that you can afford to join. Lose all of your coins in the high roller match they steered you into? Here’s an ad for a deal on more in-game coins! Want to practice offline? That also costs coins for some reason. 

If you have a gambling problem, best to steer clear of this game entirely as the in-game currency can become real all too quickly.

title: Glitch
text:
Someone either found out how to cheat to win or it’s a glitch. A couple different times now I was in a tournament and after every shot I took a message popped up saying I need to “update now”.  It would transfer me
To the App Store but shows now update. All it says is “open”. I already updated too. So every time I take a shot it closes me out but the reason why I think it’s a hack is because once I’m down to the eight ball and take my final shot I get kicked out of the current game  completely And lose. Once again I have no updates that need to be downloaded. Pretty baffling you can’t even play a game on your
Phone that means absolutely nothing and people still have to cheat. Bet they live a great life lol. Losers. Figured I’d leave a review and maybe it’ll get looked into. Merry Christmas.

title: Play with Friends sketchy
text:
If you want to play with random people it’s great! Would rather have the option to leave the game and come back when it’s my turn. Also wish I could have several games going at once, like SSG3. The game is live, meaning you can’t exit or you lose the game and you can only have 1 game going at a time. 

Controls are accurate and game play is fun! 

Playing with friends is not easy. You can challenge them if they are on line, and they challenge you. Problem is you may be playing a game when you get the challenge. So, You have to forfeit your current game to accept the challenge from a friend. If you want to play friends, you will need to agree on a time you both log into the game. It’s annoying to get friend challenges while you are in a game.

title: Really fun game!! But...
text:
8-Ball is a really fun and addicting game! It’s also a great game to pass the time, and can get very competitive, really quick. However, I’m not a big fan of the whole “Gotcha Mechanics” aspect of the game. I get it, the developers put their heart and soul into designing and building the game, and should definitely be compensated for their awesome work. I just feel there should be a better way to make it fun, without robbing your wallet to upgrade your equipment. I would definitely be down for something like a membership or subscription based game like this, and to be paired with people who are exclusive members as well. At the same time have a free portion of the game for the casual gamer.

I still recommend this game regardless of my feelings towards the monetization aspects. It’s still a great and fun game to play with friends and other people online! Kudos to Mini-clip! I’ve been a fan for over the 15 years!

title: Great game!!!! Why one star then?
text: I gave this game one star even though I love it. It really is a great game if you like pool. HOWEVER, the reason a gave one star is a GLARING FLAW. The flaw has to do with the mechanics of a game where you play against another real person. This game for some reason requires both players to be connected to the game at all times even though only one person can actually play at a time (turn based). When I’m running the table or about to win by potting the 8 or 9 ball why does my opponent have to be connected? Why can’t I just play even though my opponent has left the match? When my opponent leaves I can’t play, and I have to wait 10 to 15 seconds for the game to try to connect them. I’ve noticed a LOT of players leave, when they know they are about to lose. Why should I be inconvenienced for winning? Developers, change this aspect of the game and I’ll give 5 stars.

title: They are a rip off
text: I have played this game for years.... for some reason the “lucky” spins are geared to give you the lowest prizes... what would it hurt if they gave us a few more credits. I’ve spent money to play this game but still everyday it the spins only give the minimum prize. If that is fixed the whole thing is fixed to make you pay. It could be great but it is cheap and doesn’t want to help anyone out for better games. My daily lucky spins have given me 150 credits per day.... the wheel has several other prizes and points but it rarely ever pays off... statistically it is impossible to spin the same thing repeatedly but it always gives me the lowest prize. I don’t trust them they should fix this. Or just get rid of it I’d rather just be denied the extra points then lied to. F you 8 ball

title: AWESOME GAME!!!!!
text: This is the best pool game I have ever played!!! I downloaded it about 5 years ago, been playing every since on and off. I can’t give the developer any advice on what to make better because it is already great, the only thing I could think of is to get real creative and add different game modes, for multiplayer and for playing alone, what I mean is to add different challenge modes to make it more interesting! Maybe add different levels like have the balls set on the table and have to shoot them a certain way with so many shots! The game is already amazing as it could be but if you added challenge modes it would do nothing but make it freaking great!!!! Be cool if you guys took my advice and I seen some different modes in a couple weeks!! (By the way I have never EVER left a review for any games so this should tell you something!!!!!!!)

title: Good game, physics are passable.. too many requests for money
text:
While the game is fun, that does not make up for its failings. For one, the constant barrage of requests to buy worthless stuff is relentless. The endless boxes that “enhance” the cues never seem to improve any of the cues in any appreciable way. Add to that the anything but the basic cue costs you coins and the fact that all you really need is the basic cue, makes adding cues a total joke. Then add the multiplayer where a player who only played around 140 games with 100 balls potted has 2.3 billion in earnings.... what a joke. The aiming is frustrating and lacks a fine movement control. The balls also seem weightless as they fly around the table. Breaking is strange as one break spreads the balls around the table and doing the same motion the next time results in very little motion. Almost random and controlled by the app, not me. Also, constantly being asked to spam my friends with junk is really annoying.

Stay away.....
